channel.title: How to see my current coordinate position?
channel.description: Hi i forgot what command it was to find the exact coord i'm standing on. I'm using delta. Anyone know? I thought it was ::mypos or ::mypositon but it doesnt work. what is it?

item.title: How to see my current coordinate position?
item.dc:creator: @I_Roll_Deep I Roll Deep
item.description:
@I_Roll_Deep wrote:

escalation:

He said he fixed it…

my bad

Read full topic

item.title: How to see my current coordinate position?
item.dc:creator: @I_Roll_Deep I Roll Deep
item.description:
@I_Roll_Deep wrote:

client class:

if (command.startsWith("coords")) { sendMessage("X: "+ absX +" Y: "+ absY); }

if you are using any other class for your commands

if (command.startsWith("coords")) { p.sendMessage("You are at: Position X: "+ p.absX +" Y: "+ p.absY); }

Read full topic

item.description:
@GN_Editz wrote:

Go into your server commands file and take a look there.

item.title: How to see my current coordinate position?
item.dc:creator: @saiduntothem saiduntothem
item.description:
@saiduntothem wrote:

Nope. I tried ::mypos ::coords ::coordinates ::myposition ::whereibedawg
Everything. Anyone have any idea how to see coordinates? I’m trying to moves npcs and i’m stuck if i cant see my exact coord.
